price: Ka ce: "Lalle ne, dã a wurina akwai abin da kuke nẽman gaugãwa da shi, haƙĩƙa dã an hukunta al'amarin, a tsakãnina da tsakãninku, kuma Allah Shĩ ne Mafi sani ga azzũlumai."
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنَّ عِندِي مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِهِۦ لَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law anna ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūna bihi laquḍiya al-amru baynī wabaynakum wal-lahu aʿlamu bil-ẓālimīna
